definition: affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means

sentences.english: For example, many medical workers are convinced that the number of emergency cases increases during a full moon.
sentences.chinese: 例如，許多醫務工作者相信月圓時急診病例會增多。

sentences.english: By the General Logistics Department excellent medical worker title.
sentences.chinese: 獲總後勤部優秀醫務工作者稱號。

sentences.english: Have you been here to see Dr Tyler before?
sentences.chinese: 你曾去功泰勒醫務所看功醫熟嗎？

sentences.english: Robinovitz pushed past the queue jamming the passageway outside the infirmary .
sentences.chinese: 羅賓諾維茨擠過在醫務室門外阻塞了通道的長隊。

sentences.english: This vehicle also carried a " corpsman " , who is not shown.
sentences.chinese: 這輛車上還有一名醫務兵，這裏沒有顯示。

sentences.english: I am the medical worker of a China, deluxe title.
sentences.chinese: 我是一位中國的醫務工作者，高級職稱。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE:To offer pharmacy consultation to patients and hospital staff in out-patient department.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲醫院門診患者及醫務人員提供藥物信息服務。

sentences.english: Refers to the quotable additional qualification which is acceptable to the Medical Council of Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 意指已獲香港醫務委員會接納的認可額外資格。

sentences.english: Doctors are developing artificial wombs in which embryos can grow outside a woman's body.
sentences.chinese: 醫務人員正在研製人造子宮，實現胚胎體外生長。

sentences.english: Medical experts and the Expert Group to continue to insist on twice-daily rounds.
sentences.chinese: 醫務部和專家組專家繼續堅持每日兩次查房。

sentences.english: Pope turns and addresses a man investigating the door to the infirmary.
sentences.chinese: Pope轉身與勘查醫務室門的一個男子交談。

sentences.english: Figures refer to the number of responding medical laboratory technologists who reported retired or emigrated .
sentences.chinese: 有關數字指填報退休或移民的醫務化驗師人數。

sentences.english: The cons move through the halls to the infirmary door.
sentences.chinese: 團伙們穿過了過道，來到醫務室門口。

sentences.english: Hand-Carried Ultrasound Performed by Hospitalists: Does It Improve the Cardiac Physical Examination?
sentences.chinese: 醫務工作者進行的便攜式超聲能否改善心臟體格檢查？

sentences.english: All they need now are the keys to the infirmary.
sentences.chinese: 現在所需要的就是醫務室的門鑰匙。

sentences.english: Zhou is 55 years old , and engaged in medical services currently .
sentences.chinese: 周寶寬今年55歲，目前從事醫務服務工作。
